Sierra Leone National Revenue Authority Latest Content

Does CED have up to date data on vehicles?
Are there any obligations to be met by vehicle dealers?
Which type of vehicles have their ages falling under year of manufacture?
What is a model year reckoning index?
How is the age of a motor vehicle calculated?
What are the laws governing the importation of vehicles into Ghana?
What are the taxes on commonly imported commodities?
Does Customs valuation assess duties on goods in similar containers equally? E.g. I wish to suggest that goods in 20-footer containers should attract equal duties.
My uncle wishes to go into the import of text books and educational materials. What are the taxes?
I intend visiting Sierra Leone with my family this year with a portable TV set, radio and photographic materials and return with them after the visit. Will these attract duties?
